name: Deploy
description: The ability is triggered when the card is played.

name: Activate
description: Trigger the active ability of the card. A card cannot be activated the same turn it was played unless it gains Haste.

name: Reactivate
description: Re-enable activation of the active ability.

name: Lock
description: Disable card text. Locked cards are still able to provide protection.

name: Haste
description: The card can be activated on the turn it is played.

name: Equip
description: The ability is triggered when the equipment is assigned to a unit.

name: Passive
description: The ability can be triggered any number of times per turn, while in hand, deck, battlefield, or graveyard.

name: Turnwise
description: The ability is triggered once per turn, at turn start, while on the battlefield.

name: Play
description: Move a card from hand to the battlefield, triggering its deploy ability.

name: Resurrect
description: Play a card from graveyard (instead of from hand).

name: Tutor
description: Play a card from deck (instead of from hand).

name: Destroy
description: Move a card from battlefield to graveyard, triggering its expire ability.

name: Discard
description: Move a card from hand or deck to graveyard.

name: Draw
description: Move a card from the top of deck to hand.

name: Banish
description: Remove a card from the game, bypassing any reflex or expire abilities.

name: Protect
description: Prevent a unit from being targeted by hostile abilities (Except Assassination).

name: Vulnerable
description: The card cannot receive protection.

name: Deflect
description: The targeted card no longer protects any units.

name: Assault X
description: Destroy a unit of X or less power.

name: Assassinate X
description: Destroy a unit of X or less power, bypassing Protection.

name: Overkill X
description: Trigger this ability if an assault or assassinate ability exceeds the strength of the target unit by at least X.

name: Seize X
description: Move a unit of X or less power to it's opponents battlefield.

name: Armor X
description: Added to unit power when calculating vulnerability to Assault, Assassinate, and Seize abilities.

name: Invisible
description: The unit cannot be targeted by hostile abilities.

name: Reflex
description: Trigger this ability when an adjacent unit is destroyed.

name: Expire
description: Trigger this ability when destroyed.

name: Mana
description: An elemental resource used to trigger certain abilities.

name: Expend X
description: Reroll any X mana dice of the indicated type to trigger the ability.

name: Conjure X
description: Change any X mana dice to the indicated type.

name: Reroll X
description: Reroll any X mana dice of any color.

name: Rally X
description: Add the indicated number of points to your score.

name: Rout X
description: Subtract the indicated number of points from your score.

name: Finale
description: Trigger this ability if the card is active at the end of the round.

name: Disloyal
description: The card is played to the opposite side of the battlefield.

name: Chaos X
description: Trigger this ability if there are at least X unique mana types available.

name: Imbibe
description: Trigger the ability when a liquor card is equipped to the unit.

name: Bonded
description: Trigger the ability if you control more than one copy of the card.
